title: Simulate a Refinery Process Unit
description: A process engineer uses a simulation model to predict how a change in feed quality will impact the product output of a hydrocracker unit.

tasks.description: Load the hydrocracker's process simulation model and calibrate it with current operating data.
tasks.expected_outcome: The simulation model is loaded and reflects current plant performance.

tasks.description: Create a new case in the simulation by changing the properties of the feed stream to match the new, proposed feed.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new simulation case is set up with the modified input.

tasks.description: Run the simulation and analyze the predicted changes in product yields (e.g., diesel, jet fuel) and quality.
tasks.expected_outcome: The simulation results are generated, showing a predicted 2% decrease in diesel yield.
